general.name: mos_target_panstarrs1
general.description: A copy of the PanSTARRS1-dr2 catalogue provided by E. Magnier. Based on the internal IPP database representation mainyaned by IfA, U. Hawaii. Column names may differ from publically available catalogues hosted at MAST (mapping provided in column descriptions). The SDSS-V copy of this database is derived from a combination of the PS1-dr2 StackObjectThin and ObjectThin tables (https://outerspace.stsci.edu/display/PANSTARRS/PS1+Database+object+and+detection+tables). The catalogue contains PSF, Kron, and Aper measurements based on stacked and forced warp photometry, and expressed as fluxes, including measurements are made of low-significance detections. The average exposure (chip) measurements are expressed in magnitudes since photometry is not measured at this stage for sources with S/N < 5, so there should not be any negative fluxes. Magnitudes are on the AB system, fluxes are in Janskys. Conversion to AB mags is via: mag = 8.9 - 2.5*log10(flux).

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

releases.name: DR18
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_target_panstarrs1-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

ra.name: RA
ra.description: mean RA, (J2000, tied to Gaia DR1)

dec.name: DEC
dec.description: mean Dec, (J2000, tied to Gaia DR1)

chisqpos.name: CHISQPOS
chisqpos.description: chi-square of a fixed position astrometry solution (equiv to ObjectThin.posMeanChisq)

stargal.name: STARGAL
stargal.description: Measure of extendedness. Computed as the median across all chip measurements of extNsigma, where extNsigma = (PSF mag - Kron mag) expressed as a number of sigmas, so it somewhat adjusts for the spread at low signal-to-noise.

nmeas.name: NMEAS
nmeas.description: total number of measurements in databases (including non-PS1 data)

nwarp_ok.name: NWARP_OK
nwarp_ok.description: number of warps with psf_qf > 0 (any unmasked pixels)

objid.name: OBJID
objid.description: internal Pan-STARRS IPP object ID : unique within database spatial partition (see catID)

catid.name: CATID
catid.description: database spatial partition ID - (equiv. to StackObjectThin.dvoRegionID)

extid_hi.name: EXTID_HI
extid_hi.description: upper 32 bits of PSPS object ID (objID in MAST PSPS database)

extid_lo.name: EXTID_LO
extid_lo.description: lower 32 bits of PSPS object ID (objID in MAST PSPS database)
